Comment: That was probably another assumption from Trump but...  Without addressing the obvious concerns, morally, logistically and strategically, of ceding an inch of territory to brutal imperialists, and assuming Zelensky was willing and able to do that (which I will believe when Zelensky says it and not before), that would require Russia to withdraw from all of the rest of Ukraine, right? Otherwise they would not be ceding only Crimea but a large portion of Ukraine along with Crimea too and for essentially nothing.  So the question would then become, will Putin withdraw from Ukraine if Ukraine cedes Crimea? I don't think he will.
